A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Luke dying was weak. Reys parents Story was a cop out. No explanation of Snoke. Cheesy moments like luke dusting his shoulder off were cringe worthy. Rey as a character is underdeveloped. Had chance to kill off Finn a useless character and saved him instead. Leaves no questions worth asking for the next movie. Prequels are looking better and better after these Disney movies.
